review: Big long time t- shirt aficionado ! Best t shirt on all levels ; can immediately see and feel the difference in the cotton of these shirts ‘ and it’s legit pre-shrunk ! My only critique would be v could be a drop lower ... Other than that small personal detail this shirt is the real deal - worth the slightly higher price point and checks all the boxes for both daily casual wear or for dressier occasions work under a sports jacket or on Its own
Amazing thanku so much myntra jaisa naam waisa kaam good 👍

I recently bought a Roadster T-shirt, and overall, I'm pretty impressed with the quality. The fabric feels soft and comfortable, perfect for daily wear. It's made of 100% cotton, which makes it breathable, especially during warm weather. The fit is great too—not too tight or loose, giving a relaxed yet stylish look.

The design is minimal, which works well for casual outfits, and the color hasn't faded after a couple of washes. The stitching also seems durable, which is a plus for long-term use. However, the sizing runs a bit smaller, so you may want to consider ordering a size up if you prefer a more relaxed fit.

Overall, for the price, the Roadster T-shirt offers great value with decent comfort and style. I’d recommend it for casual outings or even layering.

This was my first time ordering from Myntra, and unfortunately, it left a bad first impression.

I ordered a t-shirt in size M but received a much larger size, either L or XL, which was quite frustrating.

The t-shirt material was thick, which I didn’t expect.

On the positive side, I did get the right product in terms of color and quality, and the delivery was on time. The quality was good for the price, but the sizing issue really soured the experience.

I really hope that the next time I order from Myntra, I’ll receive the correct item without any problems.

Been trying to find a raw edged T-shirt that looks good and is in a budget. This one goes perfectly with jeans and cargos. For my men out there, I suggest you to style it with Black or Blue jeans and some jewellery around your neck and boom there you are looking like a fine work of art??Happy Styling ❤️

The Roadster Men's Grey Melange Longline T-Shirt with Raw Edges in size L is a stylish and trendy piece for any casual outfit. The grey melange color gives it a modern, rugged look, and the raw edges add a unique touch that stands out. The longline fit is flattering and on-trend, perfect for pairing with jeans or joggers. The fabric feels soft and comfortable, making it great for all-day wear. This T-shirt combines comfort and style effortlessly – a fantastic choice for anyone looking to elevate their casual wardrobe.

Cloth quality was good and comfortable. Color was as per the pictures. But the linings on the T-shirt have torn look. Though this is the design of the t-shirt and its not faulty, but I did not like this look of t-shirt. But this is more of a personal choice.

The T-shirt is a great fit for me. If you are taller than 5'10 then I recommend going for a L size if you want those long sleeves and loose look. 
But if you want your sleeves to fit around your arms and you have a decent physique then you should go for M.
